info.short_description: Motorsport, tech & others. Sports mécaniques, tech et autres. English / Français
info.full_description:
Mastodon Racing is a federate instance of the fediverse (OStatus & ActivityPub) mainly dedicated to Motorsports and Tech. Whether you are passionate or not about Motorsports, you will always be welcome on this forum, any type of subject is accepted (news, politics, fiction, science, culture, etc.). Moderation is done in English or French.

Mastodon Racing est une instance fédérée du fediverse (OStatus & ActivityPub) principalement dédiée aux sports Mécaniques et nouvelles technologies. Que vous soyez passionné·e ou non de sports mécaniques, vous êtes bienvenue sur cette instance, tout type de sujet y est accepté (actualité, politique, fiction, science, culture, etc.). La modération se fait en anglais ou en français.

info.short_description: Mastodon Instance for fun. Speak only Bahasa Indonesia and English.
info.full_description: Medsos.web.id adalah salah satu testing server dari mastodon instance. Silakan bergabung disini dengan tetap menjaga adab dan tata krama. No nudity, no pornography, no illegal content. Selain itu sementara bebas.

info.short_description: Sportsball.Rocks is an unironic general sports Mastodon instance.  English / Spanish.
info.full_description: Sportsball.Rocks is an unironic general sports Mastodon instance.  Professional football (both), basketball, hockey, and baseball conversations are welcome as well as non-sports related talk. General politics should be avoided.

info.short_description: Mastodon for WNY residents, but welcome to all
info.full_description: A sub-project of the BuffaloMesh.net project, this instance will be guaranteed to be accessible via the Meshnet in Buffalo, NY
info.topic: WNY, Wings, Snow, Peanut Donuts, Chicken Wings, Buffalo Bills, Buffalo Sabres, and all things related
